item.title: Let a million screensavers bloom
item.description: This is nominally a “travel blog”, or something, but I also write code, and sometimes screensavers, so I thought I’d try putting this out there to see how it goes. Let me know what you think! mail@tolar.town or on twitter @tolar. Writing screensavers for macs is a little weird. But once you get past a few oddities, it can be lots of fun! For purposes of this post, I assume you have some knowledge of and experience with Xcode and Swift.
